data.name: Mythic Prelude - Concept Demo
data.detailed_description:
On a night with the sound of rain pelting the roof with the intermittent roars of thunder, Simon Gram awakens in a home that he has never seen that houses furniture larger than practical for a person of normal size, and dangers unknown. All he finds are the journals of Tlaloc, a hero that he had always admired that towered above all. From his slumber, he finds a sword and a talking raven. He must fight to survive the night, and escape the dangers of the mysterious home!

  • Fast-paced overhead combat with an intricate bullet-hell style multi-phased boss and two mini-bosses!
  • Platforming from an overhead perspective!
  • Acquire progression abilities from killing bosses!
  • A beautifully orchestrated soundtrack by The Noble Demon!
data.about_the_game:
On a night with the sound of rain pelting the roof with the intermittent roars of thunder, Simon Gram awakens in a home that he has never seen that houses furniture larger than practical for a person of normal size, and dangers unknown. All he finds are the journals of Tlaloc, a hero that he had always admired that towered above all. From his slumber, he finds a sword and a talking raven. He must fight to survive the night, and escape the dangers of the mysterious home!

  • Platforming from an overhead perspective!
  • Acquire progression abilities from killing bosses!
  • A beautifully orchestrated soundtrack by The Noble Demon!
data.short_description: Mythic Prelude is an action-adventure title inspired by Action-Adventure titles from the 90s. This concept demo is designed as a stand-alone freeware product!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10.
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10.
  • Processor: 3GHz +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
